argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | equsex.1 | |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) |
| 2 |  | equsex.2 | |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ps ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_exlimih | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> ps ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ax-i9 | |- E. x x = y |
| 6 |  | #P_idd | |- ( ps -> ( x = y -> x = y ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_biimprcd | |- ( ps -> ( x = y -> ph ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_jcad | |- ( ps -> ( x = y -> ( x = y /\ ph ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eximdh | |- ( ps -> ( E. x x = y -> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mpi | |- ( ps -> E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_impbii | |- ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) <-> ps ) |
\
 A useful equivalence related to substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by NM, 3-Feb-2015.)
